##MODIFIED VANILLA FILE##
@correct_culture_primary_score = 100
@better_than_the_alternatives_score = 50
@always_primary_score = 1000

#Title order determines which title shows in title history if multiple titles are held. ie: If k_croatia is higher in this file than k_hungary then the Kings of Hungary will show as Kings of Croatia in the title history when they hold both titles. The main effect from this is screwing up regnal numbers
#Normally I labeled added or changed titles
#The 'capital' of a duchy MUST be the first province in the listing or it won't get the duchy capital building


########################################################################################NULL TITLES########################################################################################


e_null_empire = {
	color =  { 0 0 255 1 }
	
	
	capital = c_roma

	can_create = { always = no }
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	definite_form = yes
	#de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
	can_create_on_partition = { always = no }
}

########################################################################################RELIGIOUS HEADS########################################################################################


k_papal_state = {

	color = { 255 249 198 }
	
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	landless = yes
	
	capital = c_roma
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

k_papal_states = { #Basically to use this as the de jure title instead of the above since you can't properly usurp faith head titles

	color = { 255 249 198 }
	
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	
	capital = c_roma
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:italian
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	#de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	#male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
}

e_none = { #for Anatolia/Caucasus to control de_jure conquest. Not actually creatable
	color = { 0 0 0 }
	
	capital = c_roma

	can_create = { always = no }
	can_create_on_partition = { always = no }
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	definite_form = yes
	#de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
}

e_hre = {
	color = { 255 255 255 }

	capital = c_aachen
	definite_form = yes
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
}

e_horn = {
	color = { 67 96 179 }
	

	capital = c_zaila
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	definite_form = yes
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_east_african }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_somalian }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
}

#Titles to replace e_byzantium

e_bulgaria = { #Becomes de_jure empire for Bulgaria
	color = { 108 78 110 }
	
	capital = c_turnovo # Tyrnovo
	definite_form = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no #Don't want dynasty names
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:bulgarian
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
	can_create = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
			}
			culture = culture:bulgarian
		}
	}	
}

#Breakup of Lotharingia title

k_lower_lorraine = { # Niederlothringen
	color = { 37 114 179 }
	capital = c_antwerpen # Herstal
	
	can_create = {
	
		custom_description = {
			text = form_hre_kingdoms
		
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
			
			
		
			NOT = {
				exists = title:e_hre.holder
				is_vassal_or_below_of = title:e_hre.holder
			}
		}
	}

	can_create_on_partition = {
		NOT = { 
			game_start_date >= 950.1.1
		}
	}
	
	
}	
		
k_upper_lorraine = { # Oberlothringen
	color = { 90 90 125 }
	capital = c_nancy # Blâmont # Lorraine - Nancy
	
	can_create = {
	
		custom_description = {
			text = form_hre_kingdoms
		
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
			
			
		
			NOT = {
				exists = title:e_hre.holder
				is_vassal_or_below_of = title:e_hre.holder
			}
		}
	}

	can_create_on_partition = {
		NOT = { 
			game_start_date >= 950.1.1
		}
	}

}

		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_germanic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_goidelic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }

			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}

	k_cornwall = {
		color = { 204 153 10 }
		
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:cornish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:welsh
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_cornwall
	}
	k_mann_the_isles = {
		color = { 124 59 8 }

		capital = c_isle_of_man	#Mann
	}
}

			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}


	k_old_franconia = {
		color = { 210 210 255 }
		
		
		capital = c_frankfurt
		
		can_create = {
		
			custom_description = {
			
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { is_ai = yes }
					NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
				}

			}
		}



		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:german
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:german }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
		
		
		
	}

				text = form_hre_kingdoms

					limit = { is_ai = yes }
					NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
				}
				
				
			
				NOT = {
					exists = title:e_hre.holder
					is_vassal_or_below_of = title:e_hre.holder
				}
			}
		}

			}

				limit = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
				}

			custom_description = {
				text = form_hre_kingdoms

					limit = { is_ai = yes }
					NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
					
					OR = {
						culture = culture:frisian
						culture = culture:dutch
					}
				}
				

			
				NOT = {
					exists = title:e_hre.holder
					is_vassal_or_below_of = title:e_hre.holder
				}
			}
		}

		can_create_on_partition = {
			NOT = { 
				game_start_date >= 950.1.1
			}
		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:frisian
						culture = culture:dutch
					}
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score

					NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }

	k_bosnia = {
		color = { 16 125 74 }
		
		
		capital = c_rama # Visoki

		#Titular: created by decision.
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:bosnian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:croatian
						culture = culture:serbian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

	k_cyprus = { 
		color = { 248 246 140 }
		
		
		capital = c_nicosia
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
		
		cultural_names = {
			name_list_turkish = cn_kibris
		}

		d_cyprus = {
			color = { 215 215 20 }
			
			
			capital = c_nicosia
			
			cultural_names = {
				name_list_turkish = cn_kibris
			}
			
			c_nicosia = {

		color = { 223 96 96 }
		
		
		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
		always_follows_primary_heir = yes
		definite_form = yes

		ai_primary_priority = {

				}

			}
		}
	}

	k_old_armenia = {
		color = { 223 96 96 }
		
		
		#Here to prevent Armenia's regnal numbers getting messed up, as Bagratid Armenia counted its kings starting with Ashok I, and otherwise he'd be Ashok IV.

		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		can_create = { always = no } #For historical purposes only.
		no_automatic_claims = yes	#Otherwise the Bagrationi end up with weird claims in 867.

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:armenian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	}
}

e_baltic_empire = {
	color = { 100 40 50 }
	
	
	capital = c_trakai # Trakai
	
	definite_form = yes
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_slavic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
	
	k_livonia = {
		color = { 110 80 168 }
		
		
		capital = c_vidzeme # Riga

		#Titular: created by decision.
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:latgalian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						culture = culture:latgalian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}
	
	k_lithuania = {
		color = { 90 10 0 }
		
		
		capital = c_kernave # Kernave
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:lithuanian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}

				#	exists = title:e_hre.holder

		}

				limit = {

	k_kipchak = { #
		color = { 200 150 50 }
		
		
		capital = c_jiren_suat #'The summer home of the Kimak Khakans was in the town of Imak, in the middle Irtysh, the winter capital was Tamim on the southern shore of lake Balkhash.' 
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:k_pechenegs }
				NOT = { exists = title:k_cumania }
				NOT = { exists = title:k_qipchaq }
				NOT = { exists = title:k_qangli }
				NOT = { exists = title:k_kipchak }
			}

e_persia = {
	color = { 30 240 230 }
	
	
	can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				NOT = {  culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_mongolic } } #Don't want Ilkhanate making Persia
			}
	}
	
	can_create_on_partition = { always = no }	
	
	capital = c_isfahan #	Esfahan
	
	definite_form = yes
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:persian
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
	
	k_ormus = {
		color = { 111 210 21 }

e_france = {
	color = { 11 22 170 }
	
	#can_create = {
	#
	#	 completely_controls = title:k_france
	#	 completely_controls = title:k_brittany
	#	 completely_controls = title:k_aquitaine
	#}
		
	capital = c_ile_de_france
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:french
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:norman
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	k_aquitaine = {
		color = { 54 50 226 }
		
		
		capital = c_bordeaux # Bordaeux
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				NOT = { has_title = title:k_france
						has_title = title:k_england #Let's not let England make this title in later bookmarks
					}
			}

		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:french
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_spain = {
	color = { 233 200 20 }
	
	
	capital = c_toledo # Toledo

		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
	cultural_names = {
		name_list_bedouin = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_butr = cn_isbaniya

	k_castille = { #Spain
		color = { 188 150 0 }

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}

			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:castilian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_navarra = {
		color = { 225 44 44 }
		
		capital = c_navarra # Pamplona
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:basque
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_maghreb = {
	color = { 209 63 44 }
	
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = yes 
	capital = c_marrakesh # Marrakesh
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:butr
					culture = culture:baranis
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

		}

		color = { 145 55 18 }
		capital = c_alodia 
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_east_african }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

e_mali = {
	color = { 225 223 0 }
	
	
	capital = c_niani #	Niani
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_african }

				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}

e_kalinga = {
	color = { 10 115 30	}
	
	capital = c_kataka # Kataka
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:oriya
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	
	
	k_bastar = {
		color = { 58 150 70 }

	}

	}

#Shrinks the 'Deccan Empire' and makes it so the Chola Dynasty and later Pandya Dynasty can properly be an empire
e_chola = {
	color = { 210 35 60 }
	
	capital = c_cholamandalam
	
	definite_form = no
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_dravidian }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

e_srivijaya = {
	color = { 33 120 68 }
	
	
	k_tambralinga = {
		color = { 1 121 98 }
		
		capital = c_tambralinga
		
		d_takola = {
			color = { 20 99 90 }

			c_takola = {
				color = { 1 100 101 }

				cultural_names = {
					name_list_tai = cn_takua_pa
					name_list_sinhala = cn_takun
					name_list_bedouin = cn_kakola
				}

				b_takola = {
					province = 13271

					color = { 96 107 138 }

					cultural_names = {
						name_list_tai = cn_takua_pa
						name_list_sinhala = cn_takun
						name_list_bedouin = cn_kakola
					}
				}
				b_tako_klang = {
					province = 11131

					color = { 96 107 138 }

					cultural_names = {
						name_list_tai = cn_takua_thung
					}
				}
				b_bu_nga = {
					province = 11132

					color = { 96 107 138 }

					cultural_names = {
						name_list_tai = cn_phu_nga
					}
				}
				b_pantai_smor = {
					province = 13273

					color = { 71 95 161 }
				}
				b_klong_thom = {
					province = 11128

					color = { 71 95 161 }
				}
			}
			c_salang = {
				color = { 37 103 105 }

				cultural_names = {
					name_list_tai = cn_thalang
					name_list_han = cn_silan
				}

				b_salang = {
					province = 13272

					color = { 87 104 150 }

					cultural_names = {
						name_list_tai = cn_thalang
						name_list_han = cn_silan
					}
				}
			}
		}
		d_tambralinga = {
			color = { 64 100 71 }

			cultural_names = {
				name_list_tai = cn_tampornling
				name_list_han = cn_tanmaling

				# Dravidians
				name_list_tamil = cn_madamalingam
				name_list_sinhala = cn_madamalingam
				name_list_telugu = cn_madamalingam

e_nippon = {
	color = { 100 0 0 }
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	
	definite_form = yes
	
	capital = c_yamashiro
	
	#Titular/Special
	
	k_nippon = { #日本
		color = { 40 23 1 }
		can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
		
		definite_form = yes
		
		capital = c_yamashiro
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:yamato
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	}
	
	k_kamakura_bakufu = { #鎌倉幕府

				}

			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:ryukyu
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
		
		cultural_names = {
			name_list_yamato = cn_k_ryukyu
		}

		d_okinawa = { # 沖縄
			color = { 64 1 1 }
			
			capital = c_chuuzan
			
			ai_primary_priority = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						culture = culture:ryukyu
					}
					add = @correct_culture_primary_score
				}
			}
			
			cultural_names = {
				name_list_yamato = cn_d_okinawa
			}

			c_chuuzan = {  #中山
				color = { 82 1 1 }
			
				b_chuuzan = {
					province = 13891

					color = { 158 115 72 }
				}
            }
			c_nanzan = {  #南山
				color = { 99 8 14 }
			
				b_nanzan = {
					province = 13788

					color = { 188 145 112 }
				}
            }
			c_hokuzan = {  #北山
				color = { 70 19 29 }
				
				cultural_names = {
					name_list_yamato = cn_c_hokuzan
				}
				
				b_hokuzan = {
					province = 13890
					
					color = { 128 85 52 }
				}
            }
			c_amami = { # 奄美
				color = { 42 1 1 }
				
				b_amami = {
					province = 13729

					color = { 208 201 255 }
				}
			}

			}

				}

		}

			color = { 124 63 72 }
			definite_form = yes
			capital = c_higo
			ruler_uses_title_name = no

	color = { 84 78 60 }
	can_create = { always = no }
}

	can_create = { always = no }
